mapper.select: SELECT dbo.T_Nation.Nation AS nation FROM dbo.T_Nation

SELECT dbo.Resign_Reason.Reason_ID AS reasonId, dbo.Resign_Reason.Reason_Name AS reasonName FROM dbo.Resign_Reason
AND dbo.Resign_Reason.Reason_Name = #{reasonName}

SELECT dbo.T_Department.ID AS ID, dbo.T_Department.Name AS Name, dbo.T_Department.ParentID AS ParentID, dbo.T_Department.OrderNum AS OrderNum FROM dbo.T_Department
AND dbo.T_Department.Name=#{Name}
SELECT Position_ID AS positionId, Position_Name AS positionName FROM Position_Data
SElECT Project_ID AS ProjectID, Project_Name AS ProjectName FROM Project_Data

SELECT TEB.JobNum AS jobnum ,TEB.Name AS name ,AF.name AS chname ,AF.Birthday AS birth ,AF.appellation AS appellation ,AF.workaddress AS workAddress ,AF.position AS position ,AF.phone AS phone ,AF.wechat AS wechat ,AF.address AS famAddress FROM Account_Family AF Left Join Account_Data AD ON AF.Account_ID = AD.Account_ID Left Join T_Employee_Basic TEB ON TEB.Account = AD.Account_ID
AND AF.name like '%'+#{chname}+'%'
AND Month(AF.Birthday)=#{birth}
AND TEB.isDelete=0
AND TEB.Name like '%'+#{name}+'%' or TEB.JobNum like '%'+#{jobnum}+'%'
ORDER BY TEB.JobNum

SELECT a.IDNum AS uIdNum, a.Political AS uPloitical, a.HomeTown AS uHomeTown, a.Nationality AS uNationality, a.Marital AS uMarital, a.HomeAddress AS uHomeAddress, a.CurrentAddress AS uCurrentAddress, a.Domicile AS uDomicile, a.AccountProp AS uAccountProp, a.Schools AS uSchools, a.Education AS uEducation, a.Profession AS uProfession, a.Graduation AS uGraduation, a.AtSchool AS uAtSchool, a.Contact AS uContact, a.EmergencyContact AS uEmergencyContact, a.Emergencyphone AS uEmergencyphone, a.LicenseType AS uLicenseType, a.DrivingExpe AS uDrivingExpe FROM dbo.T_Employee_Detial a where a.Employee_basic_ID=#{uEmployeeBasicID}
SELECT dbo.T_Department.ID FROM dbo.Account_Data where Account_Name=#(uAccount)
